Back in 2011, Joël Franusic published a neat visualization of all Y Combinator startups' hosting decisions using his neat open source domain-profiler software. I was curious to know what had changed since then, so instead of profiling all YC startups this time, I only profiled the Winter 2012 batch as retrieved from this unofficial YC startups spreadsheet.
